title: Mailvox: To the Ilk of the Surge
author: VD
content_html:
From the Publisher:

I’m delighted with the efforts of your bloggers to get the early buzz for the book. Hitting the top 100 is a great accomplishment and you sold out Amazon, so I’m anticipating a nice reorder from them. Great job!

As for me, I can only say well done and thank you. Thank you very much! And check this out:

What Do Customers Ultimately Buy After Viewing Items Like This?

97% buy the item featured on this page:
Liberal Fascism: The Secret History of the American Left, From Mussolini to the Politics of Meaning
3.4 out of 5 stars (85)

1% buy The Irrational Atheist: Dissecting the Unholy Trinity of Dawkins, Harris, and Hitchens
5.0 out of 5 stars (4)

1% buy Gastroanomalies: Questionable Culinary Creations from the Golden Age of American Cookery
4.8 out of 5 stars (13)

1% buy An Inconvenient Book: Real Solutions to the World’s Biggest Problems
4.2 out of 5 stars (314)

If TIA ever approaches LF’s lofty territory and they hit the same bestseller lists, that popping noise you’ll hear will be heads exploding all over the Internet. For that matter, I wonder which must puzzle Jonah more, his bestseller seeing crossover with an atheism book or a culinary one.
